actions.committee: Senate Committee on Judiciary by unanimous consent with instructions that when the bill is reported it be referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works for not to exceed thirty days
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary by unanimous consent with instructions that when the bill is reported it be referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works for not to exceed thirty days.

official_title: A bill granting the consent of Congress to the compact between the States of New Hampshire and Vermont concerning solid waste.

summary.text: Interstate Compact - Grants the consent of Congress to the cooperative agreement between the States of New Hampshire and Vermont for the construction and operation of facilities for the processing or disposal of solid waste.

titles.title: A bill granting the consent of Congress to the compact between the States of New Hampshire and Vermont concerning solid waste.
